    Methods in it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server with parameters of type SocketClient
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    MainServerController.connectListener(SocketClient client)
    Connects a SocketClient to the server, and adds it to the list of sockets that need to complete their connection, starts a timeout timer in case they don't complete it in time.
    void
    MainServerController.setupSocketListener(SocketClient client, String username)
    Finalizes the connection of a SocketClient to the server by setting its username.
    private TimerTask
    MainServerController.TCPTimeoutTask(MainServerController controller, SocketClient client)
    Creates a timeout task for a SocketClient in its setup state, closing the connection and removing them from any list in case they don't setup in time.
